lead_paragraph: The Caucus blog has invited people to send in videos describing why they're voting this year. Though many Learning Network readers are not yet old enough to vote, if you could, would you? Why or why not? What issues or events would be most likely to drive you to the polls? For ideas, you might start by watching the video a reader named David Donar made, shown at the top of the post.
snippet: Student Opinion | Tell us if you'd be likely to vote this year if you were old enough. What issues or events would motivate you to go to the polls?

headline.main: Would You Vote This Year If You Could?

abstract: Student Opinion | Tell us if you'd be likely to vote this year if you were old enough. What issues or events would motivate you to go to the polls?
